0.title: Who Are We?
0.desc: We are a film photography club at the University of Washington, dedicated to preserving and sharing the art of analog photography. Our community brings together students passionate about capturing moments through the timeless medium of film.

1.title: What We Do
1.desc: We explore the art of film photography through hands-on experiences, including shooting with various film formats and developing photos in our dedicated darkroom. Our members learn the entire process, from capturing moments on film to developing and printing their work. Additionally, we offer media coverage services for other UW clubs and events, using film photography to provide a unique and timeless visual perspective.
